name: glovia-nepal
description: Glovia Nepal E-Commerce Platform - Full Stack Application

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.start: npm run start:backend & npm run start:frontend
scripts.dev: npm run dev:backend & npm run dev:frontend

author: Glovia Nepal
